verbs.description: [ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG1: his phone calls with U.S. President Donald Trump and other world leaders were just like sausages : better not explain what 's inside] .

French President Emmanuel Macron said on Tuesday [ARG1: his phone calls with U.S. President Donald Trump and other world leaders] [V: were] [ARG2: just like sausages] : better not explain what 's inside .

French President Emmanuel Macron said on Tuesday his phone calls with U.S. President Donald Trump and other world leaders were just like sausages : [ARGM-ADV: better] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: explain] [ARG1: what 's inside] .
